title: I literrly got 0 LP !!!!
body:
So i played this fucking game for an hour kept disconnecting briefly becuase my interent was bad for that game and just that game
, we finally grind that whole game i did my best so hard .....and we won , was really happy just to find that i did not receive any fucking LP !!!! really??!?!?!? fix your fcking afk system ...literally 1 wasted hour .. i can not accpet that give me my lp pooints this is ridiclous.

replies.body: First there is no LP there is only BE, second you don't get BE every game, you only get it possibly when you level, but more than likely you get champ shards. If you don't level, the only time you get BE is if it's a mission that gives BE otherwise the only thing you get is XP for levels.
LP doesn't exist anymore, they took it away, it's now replaced by a currecy called BE, the blue stuff you get when you level up/do quests.

LP is the thing you get when you win ranked games, you are lvl 23 so you are not yet experienced with LP, once you start playing ranked, you will understand LP
You're funny, my main is level 158.
are you dumb? LP LP LP LP LP LP THE THING YOU GET WHEN YOU WIN A RANKED GAME LP LP LP LP LP

If you disconnect a certain length of time in a ranked match, you are qualified as an AFK, even if you don't end the game AFK. So if you were constantly disconnecting, you then triggered qualification for AFK status, and thus, you get no LP for winning the match.
Greetings, you should report this through riot support's ticket system! :)

I think your reaction on the boards doesn't really get you anything. I have submitted a ticket before and they looked into the game and screen shots I sent them and they actually gave me the LP.

Probably not possible for you now, since you're just here overreacting and not thinking of what you could actually do to try to get it fixed, but oh well.

You will waste many more hours on this game. That's what games are for--to waste time.
